analysis.key_quote: Most, if not all, federal employees must remain apolitical in order to protect the constitution from abuses of power and to allow the work of the people of the United States to continue without interruption during the course of their careers.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the conversion to Schedule F, emphasizing the need for federal employees to remain apolitical to protect the constitution and prevent political interference, which aligns with concerns about politicization and the integrity of the civil service.
